name: The simple game
description:
The simple game is student game project - game, but the simplest possible for learning the Godot game engine basic. Playing with arrow keys, your goal is to get some moving objects. Simple moving system for object, moving system for character and score. Good to know for itch published games, sometimes refresh is good for game start, and one click in playable window for controls to work.

You can also recreate this game. Only some learning is needed before.

Start with SLAVS MAKE GAMES course, hire on itch:

https://slavs-make-games.itch.io/create-a-game-in-godot-31-under-9min-video-less...

Download and read pdf text from other SLAVS MAKE GAMES course:

https://slavs-make-games.itch.io/slavs-make-games-pdf-book-tutorial-for-2d-and-3...

And visit SLAVS MAKE GAMES to learn how to finish a game:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoQdUvJGxiIwg7SkHnlPZ6g
